metadata.title: CVE-2018-7174 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in xpdf 4.00. An infinite loop in XRef::Xref allows an attacker to cause denial of service because loop detection exists only for tables, not streams.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-7174` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler111 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
poppler-utils - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> poppler doesn't have a while in that section of code, doesn't look affected

criterions.comment: ipe package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.62.0-1ubuntu1').
xpdf package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
